tool.name: Extract Ab regions
tool.command: ANARCI --sequence '$input_fasta' --scheme '$anarci_scheme' --csv --outfile 'numbering_raw'; #if [ -f numbering_raw_H.csv ]: cp numbering_raw_H.csv numbering_H.csv; #end if #if [ -f numbering_raw_KL.csv ]: cp numbering_raw_KL.csv numbering_H.csv; #end if #for $filter in $filters: python $__tool_directory__/filter-csv.py -i 'numbering_${filter.chain}.csv' '${filter.position}=${filter.value}'; #end for mkdir -p regions; #for $region in $regions: python $__tool_directory__/extract-ab-region.py --numbering-file 'numbering_${region.chain}.csv' --name '${region.name}' --start '${region.start}' --end '${region.end}' --output-file 'regions/${region.__index__}_${region.name}.tsv'; #end for csvjoin -t -c 1 regions/*.tsv | csvformat -T > '$output_file'

param.label: Input FASTA
param.help: The FASTA file with Ab sequences to extract regions from.

param.label: Numbering scheme
param.help: Ab numbering scheme to pass to ANARCI

param.name: name
param.label: Region name
param.help: The name that will be used for the region.

param.name: chain
param.label: Chain
param.help: Which chain the region is located on.

param.name: start
param.label: Start position
param.help: The numbered position where the region starts (inclusive).

param.name: end
param.label: End position
param.help: The numbered position where the region ends (inclusive).

param.name: chain
param.label: Chain
param.help: Which chain the validation position is located on.

param.name: position
param.label: Position
param.help: The position to validate the value of.

param.name: value
param.label: Amino acid
param.help: Which amino acid to allow at position to validate ANARCI numbering.

tool.help:
.. class:: infomark.
**What it does**
This tool takes a FASTA file of Ab sequences, numbers it with ANARCI, and extract specified sequence regions.
It outputs a tabular file where the first column is the IDs found in the FASTA and each column is a sequence region.
There is an option to filter the ANARCI numbering entries by their amino acid in specific numbered positions to validate that the sequence has been properly aligned.
